dt-api.name: columns().columnControl.searchClear()
dt-api.summary: Remove any ColumnControl applied search from the selected columns

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the selected columns.
type.description: Remove any search that was applied to the column via ColumnControl inputs.

dt-api.description:
Matching `-api column().columnControl.searchClear()`, this method will remove any ColumnControl applied search term from the selected columns (all columns if no selector is provided to `-api columns()`).
Note that the table will not be automatically redrawn when this method has been called. You need to call `-api draw()` to display the changes as a result of the updated search.

example.title: Remove ColumnControl applied search terms from all columns
